verses.text: PEA na‘e hilifaki ‘e Kingi ‘Ehasivelo ha tukuhau ki he fonua mo e ngaahi motu ‘o tahi.

Pea ko e ngaahi ngāue kotoa pē ‘o hono hau, mo hono fu‘u ivi, pea mo e fakamatala kotoa ki he mā‘olunga ‘o Motekiai ‘i hono hākeaki‘i ‘e he tu‘i, ‘ikai kuo tohi ia ‘i he Puka ‘o e Kalonikali ‘o e ngaahi Tu‘i Mītia mo Pēsia?

He ko Motekiai Siu na‘e hoko mo Kingi ‘Ehasivelo, pea ne fotu ‘i he kau Siu, pea na‘e ‘ofeina ‘e he tokolahi ‘i hono kāinga; ‘o ne feinga‘i ‘a e lelei ‘o hono kakai, ‘o ne lea malū ki hono fa‘ahinga kotoa.
